int TTTR::read_file ( const char *  fn,
int  container_type 
)
protected

Reads the TTTR data contained in a file into the TTTR object

Parameters
fnThe filename
container_typeThe container type.
Returns
Returns 1 in case the file was read without errors. Otherwise 0 is returned.

◆ read_records()

void TTTR::read_records ( size_t  n_rec,
bool  rewind,
size_t  chunk 
)
protected

Reads n_records records of the file (n_records is the number of records)

Parameters
n_recis the number of records that are being read. If no number of records to be read is specified all records in the file are being read. If the parameter
rewindis true (default behaviour) the file is read from the beginning of the records till the end of the file or till n_red records have been read. If
rewindis false the records are being read from the current location of the file pointer till the end of the file.
